name: LoopMe Media
overview:
LoopMe is global leader in mobile advertising inbox technology and uses social preference targeting to improve customer experience and results for advertisers and publishers.

LoopMe makes advertising less intrusive, more enjoyable, valuable and relevant for mobile consumers by giving them greater choice and confidence.

Greater choice comes from creating an environment populated with different offers, branded experiences and apps to download that consumers can decide to enter. Greater confidence comes by adding social data to give consumers more information before they decide to click and interact advertising creating genuine browsing, interaction and shopping behavior.
